article_title: How Much Of The Cost Should The Patient Bear?

article_metadata.description: A striking feature of the insurance offered on the ObamaCare health insurance exchanges is the imposition of very high deductibles. For example, the law allows the deductible to be as high as $6,600 for an individual and $13,200 for a family in 2015. A Kaiser Foundation survey finds that on [...]
article_metadata.author: John C. Goodman
